title: 算法设计与分析-课后练习19
slug: 算法设计与分析-课后练习19
path: api/articles/算法设计与分析-课后练习19.json
content:
课后练习19

python
n = 4
w = [5, 3, 4, 7]
p = [3, 2, 5, 9]
M = 15
python
s_1 = []
s = [(0, 0)]

for i in range(n):
    s_i = []
    cur_couple = (p[i], w[i])
    s_i.append(cur_couple)
    for j in range(len(s_1)-1, -1, -1):
        for item in s_1[j]:
            if (p[i] + item[0], w[i] + item[1]) in s_i:
                continue
            s_i.append((p[i] + item[0], w[i] + item[1]))
        
    s_1.append(s_i)
    s += s_i
    for j in range(len(s_i)):
        is_modified = False
        for item_s in s:
            item_s_i = s_i[j]
            if item_s[0] < item_s_i[0] and item_s[1] > item_s_i[1]:
                s.remove(item_s)
s.sort(key=lambda s_item: s_item[1])
python
print('s = ' + str(s))


for i in range(len(s_1)):
    print('s_' + str(i+1) + ' = ' + str(s_1[i]))
txt
s = [(0, 0), (2, 3), (5, 4), (7, 7), (9, 7), (11, 10), (14, 11), (16, 14), (17, 16), (19, 19)]
s_1 = [(3, 5)]
s_2 = [(2, 3), (5, 8)]
s_3 = [(5, 4), (7, 7), (10, 12), (8, 9)]
s_4 = [(9, 7), (14, 11), (16, 14), (19, 19), (17, 16), (11, 10), (14, 15), (12, 12)]
python
target_couple = ()
for i in range(len(s)):
    if s[i][1] == M:
        target_couple = s[i]
        break
    elif s[i][1] > M and i > 0:
        target_couple = s[i-1]
        break
        
print('f('+str(M)+') 由序偶' +str(target_couple)+ '给出')
txt
f(15) 由序偶(16, 14)给出
